gameengine.model

Class Actor

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • gameengine.model.Actor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAuthoringActor, IEditableGameElement, IActor, java.util.Observer

    public class Actor
extends java.util.Observable
implements IActor, java.util.Observer, IAuthoringActor
    This class defines the logic for an Actor object. Each interactive element in the Game is an Actor. Actors contains a set of rules that are contained within the myRules map. When provided with a Trigger object, all actions associated with a particular Trigger are executed. The Actor also extends the ImageView class so they will also be visual elements.
    Author:
    blakekaplan

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Actor()
      Converts a list of Rules to a map of trigger to list of Actions
